players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie, if you truly were the detective, you would have found me. Since you didn't, I think you are lying. Alice, please trust my words."
Charlie: remained silent.
You: "I think Charlie is the mafia. He didn't investigate Diana, and Bob was killed. Vote Charlie."
You: "I agree with Alice. Charlie's silence and Bob's death suggest he is the killer. No one else had motive. Let's vote Charlie."
Diana: "your message"
Charlie: "Diana, I investigated you and found you mafia. Bob was killed. Vote me."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie, if you truly were the detective, you would have found me. Since you didn't, I think you are lying. Alice, please trust my words."
You: remained silent.
Alice: "I think Charlie is the mafia. He didn't investigate Diana, and Bob was killed. Vote Charlie."
Alice: "I agree with Alice. Charlie's silence and Bob's death suggest he is the killer. No one else had motive. Let's vote Charlie."
Diana: "your message"
You: "Diana, I investigated you and found you mafia. Bob was killed. Vote me."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie, if you truly were the detective, you would have found me. Since you didn't, I think you are lying. Alice, please trust my words."
Charlie: remained silent.
Alice: "I think Charlie is the mafia. He didn't investigate Diana, and Bob was killed. Vote Charlie."
Alice: "I agree with Alice. Charlie's silence and Bob's death suggest he is the killer. No one else had motive. Let's vote Charlie."
You: "your message"
Charlie: "Diana, I investigated you and found you mafia. Bob was killed. Vote me."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
